result.eng: We were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
result.ga: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe
result.orig: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe

result.ponchtml: Ḃí frustraċas orainn mar ġeall ar an easpa foclóirí maiṫeWe were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.

result.eng: The tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ga: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.orig: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsire
result.html: Cuireadh an turas ar ceal de bharr drochaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ an turas ar ceal de ḃarr droċaimsireThe tour was cancelled because of bad weather.

result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: I got the job because of the experience I had.
result.ga: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agam
result.orig: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agam
result.html: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taithí a bhí agamI got the job because of the experience I had.
result.ponchtml: Fuair mé an jab i ngeall ar an taiṫí a ḃí agamI got the job because of the experience I had.

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.eng: Because of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.
result.ga: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal
result.orig: Mar gheall ar an drochaimsir cuireadh an turas ar ceal

result.ponchtml: Mar ġeall ar an droċaimsir cuireaḋ an turas ar cealBecause of the bad weather, the tour was cancelled.

result.eng: We cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ga: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.orig: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé

result.eng: We couldn't leave the house because of the rain.
result.ga: Ní raibh muid ábalta an teach a fhágáil de bharr na báistí

result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ muid ábalta an teaċ a ḟágáil de ḃarr na báistíWe couldn't leave the house because of the rain.

result.eng: I wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ga: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn

result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ mé anseo an tseaċtain seo caite mar ḃí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.eng: I have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.
result.ga: Tá orm hata a chaitheamh toisc go bhfuil an ghrian ag taitneamh

result.ponchtml: Tá orm hata a ċaiṫeaṁ toisc go ḃfuil an ġrian ag taitneaṁI have to wear a hat because the sun is shining.

result.eng: The reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.
result.ga: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta
result.orig: Is é fáth mo shuime sa cheist seo thar cheisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsanta

result.ponchtml: Is é fáṫ mo ẛuime sa ċeist seo ṫar ċeisteanna eile ná go mbaineann sí liom go pearsantaThe reason why I am interested in this question more than other questions is because it concerns me personally.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna

result.eng: They moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ga: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.orig: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na Polainne
result.html: Bhog siad go dtí an Fhrainc mar is maith a d'airigh siad an chontúirt a bhí ann do Ghiúdaigh na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.
result.ponchtml: Ḃog siad go dtí an Ḟrainc mar is maiṫ a d'airiġ siad an ċontúirt a ḃí ann do Ġiúdaiġ na PolainneThey moved to France because they were very well aware how dangerous things were for Polish Jews.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
